products.title: 01. EL TIGRE
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

products.title: 02. la cucaracha
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

products.title: 03. la lagartija
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Caramel,  grapes, strwaberry, you name it! Itâ€™s great choice for warm summer days.

products.title: 04. Maraka
products.description: Maraka, a mysterious and captivating essence, beckons only to the boldest palates. Its enigmatic bitterness, reminiscent of midnight shadows, mingles with a delicate nutty intrigue, evoking an adventure for the senses that defies the ordinary.

products.title: 05. Hakuna
products.description: Introducing Nebula Noir, a cosmic blend that sweeps across your taste buds like a starlit journey through the galaxy. Velvety streams of dark chocolate intertwine with the ethereal essence of vanilla mist, creating a celestial dance of flavors that lingers long after the last sip, leaving you craving another voyage into its infinite depths.

products.title: 06. WestRock
products.description: Introducing WestRock, a cosmic blend that sweeps across your taste buds like a starlit journey through the galaxy. Velvety streams of dark chocolate intertwine with the ethereal essence of vanilla mist, creating a celestial dance of flavors that lingers long after the last sip, leaving you craving another voyage into its infinite depths.
